name: Always Outnumbered, a Competitive Tower Defense Game
blurb: A different kind of Tower Defense game: equal parts compelling narrative and cutthroat, competitive multiplayer.

rewards.reward: Want to support the project, but don't actually want to buy anything? This is the reward for you. You'll receive our undying gratitude, and we'll add you to the project's backers & special thanks lists on the website and in game credits.

Beta Bundle: includes the Full Game Bundle (a digitally distributed copy of the game, playable on PC or Mac, plus an exclusive desktop wallpaper and a digital copy of the Always Outnumbered art book), plus access to the CLOSED BETA, including early adopter forum and credit in the game.\r\n\r\nWant access to the closed beta after these 500 have sold out? Most of our more expensive rewards contain closed beta access as well.
Full Game Bundle: A digitally distributed copy of the game, playable on PC or Mac, plus an exclusive desktop wallpaper and a digital copy of the Always Outnumbered art book.
Get two copies of the Full Game Bundle
Get the Beta Bundle and Soundtrack (high quality and DRM free!)
Get the Beta Bundle, the Soundtrack, and Always Outnumbered Button. Please add $10 for international shipping.
Get FOUR copies of the Beta Bundle, plus the Soundtrack
Get the Beta Bundle, the Soundtrack, and an Art Print (signed by one of our artists!). Please add $10 for international shipping.
Get the Beta Bundle, Soundtrack, Art Print, and T-Shirt (Kickstarter-exclusive Always Outnumbered Backers T-shirt!). Please add $10 for international shipping.

Get the Beta Bundle, Soundtrack, Art Print, T-Shirt, and Unlimited DLC (free access to all DLC ever released for Always Outnumbered, up to a week before it's available to the public!). Please add $10 for international shipping.

Get the Beta Bundle, Sountrack, Art Print, T-Shirt, Unlimited DLC, and and the Always Outnumbered Artbook (printed and bound; includes exclusive content not available in the digital version.), and Launch Party Invite! (Come to our exclusive PAX launch party in Seattle).

Get the Beta Bundle, Soundtrack, Art Print, T-Shirt, Unlimited DLC, Always Outnumbered Artbook, Launch Party Invite, and GO Gaming will write an article about your event (Even if it's just you. Alone. Seriously).
Want to run your own tournament? Get the Beta Bundle, 32 Full Game Bundles, Soundtrack, Art Print, T-Shirt, Unlimited DLC, Always Outnumbered Artbook, and Launch Party Invite

Get the Beta Bundle, Soundtrack, Art Print, T-Shirt, Unlimited DLC,  Always Outnumbered Artbook, Launch Party Invite, and Figurine (exclusive, collectible, you'll receive a figurine of the in-game enemy or structure of your choice).

Get the Beta Bundle, Soundtrack, Art Print, T-Shirt, Unlimited DLC,  Always Outnumbered Artbook, Launch Party Invite, and Limited Edition Figurine (you'll work with SRRN to design the look of an in-game enemy or structure, and receive a figurine of that unit, handpainted and signed by our artists.).
Get the Beta Bundle, Soundtrack, Art Print, T-Shirt, Unlimited DLC, Always Outnumbered Artbook, Launch Party Invite, Figurine, and work with SRRN to design some of the game's first post-launch DLC.

All previous rewards, and come hang out with SRRN Games and GO Gaming. We'll take you to lunch and dinner, play games with you, show you around our offices, draw caricatures of you, introduce you to the team, and do our best to convey in two days what it's like to work at a game studio! We'll also give you lots of swag.
